destinations.name: Goa
destinations.description: Famous for pristine beaches, vibrant nightlife, Portuguese heritage, water sports, and seafood.

attractions.name: Baga Beach
attractions.description: Lively beach known for shacks, water sports, and nightlife.

attractions.name: Calangute Beach
attractions.description: The 'Queen of Beaches,' popular and often crowded.

attractions.name: Fort Aguada
attractions.description: 17th-century Portuguese fort overlooking the Arabian Sea.

attractions.name: Basilica of Bom Jesus
attractions.description: UNESCO site holding the remains of St. Francis Xavier.

destinations.name: Tungnath
destinations.description: Highest Shiva temple in the Panch Kedar, near Chopta; gateway to Chandrashila summit.

destinations.name: Rudranath
destinations.description: Remote Panch Kedar temple set in alpine meadows, reached via scenic multi-day trek.

destinations.name: Madhyamaheshwar
destinations.description: Panch Kedar temple in a picturesque valley with Chaukhamba views; moderate trek from Ransi.

destinations.name: Kalpeshwar
destinations.description: Year-round accessible Panch Kedar temple near Urgam Valley, known for cave shrine of Shiva.

destinations.name: Andaman Islands
destinations.description: Tropical paradise with crystal-clear waters, coral reefs, pristine beaches, and scuba diving.

attractions.name: Radhanagar Beach (Havelock)
attractions.description: Voted Asia's best beach, known for sunset views.

attractions.name: Cellular Jail (Port Blair)
attractions.description: Colonial prison, now a national memorial with light and sound show.

attractions.name: Elephant Beach (Havelock)
attractions.description: Famous spot for snorkelling and sea walking.

destinations.name: Gokarna
destinations.description: Serene beaches, laid-back vibe, temples, yoga retreats, and less crowded alternative to Goa.

attractions.name: Om Beach
attractions.description: Shaped like the Om symbol, popular for water activities.

attractions.name: Mahabaleshwar Temple
attractions.description: Ancient Hindu temple dedicated to Lord Shiva.

destinations.name: Manali
destinations.description: Beautiful hill station with snow-capped mountains, adventure sports, valleys, and honeymoon destination.

attractions.name: Solang Valley
attractions.description: Famous for paragliding, zorbing, and skiing (winter).

attractions.name: Hadimba Devi Temple
attractions.description: Ancient cave temple surrounded by a cedar forest.

attractions.name: Rohtang Pass
attractions.description: High mountain pass offering stunning views (seasonal access).

destinations.name: Ladakh
destinations.description: Land of high passes with stunning landscapes, Buddhist monasteries, lakes, and adventure.

attractions.name: Pangong Lake
attractions.description: Famous for its changing colors and stunning high-altitude views.

attractions.name: Nubra Valley
attractions.description: Cold desert valley known for double-hump camels and scenic vistas.

attractions.name: Shanti Stupa (Leh)
attractions.description: White-domed Buddhist stupa offering panoramic views of Leh.

destinations.name: Shimla
destinations.description: Queen of Hills with colonial architecture, toy train, mall road, and family-friendly atmosphere.

attractions.name: The Ridge
attractions.description: Large open space with a church and excellent views.

attractions.name: Kalka–Shimla Railway
attractions.description: UNESCO World Heritage narrow-gauge railway.

destinations.name: Darjeeling
destinations.description: Queen of the Hills famous for tea gardens, toy train, Tiger Hill sunrise, and Kanchenjunga views.

destinations.name: Nainital
destinations.description: Charming hill station centered around Naini Lake with boating, scenic views, and pleasant climate.

destinations.name: Mussoorie
destinations.description: Queen of Hills with Gun Hill, Kempty Falls, mall road, and panoramic Himalayan views.

destinations.name: Spiti Valley
destinations.description: Cold desert mountain valley with ancient monasteries, stunning landscapes, and adventure trekking.

attractions.name: Key Monastery
attractions.description: Largest and oldest monastery in Spiti, stunning architecture.

attractions.name: Chandratal Lake
attractions.description: The 'Moon Lake,' a high-altitude serene lake (seasonal access).

attractions.name: Kaza Town
attractions.description: Main administrative and commercial centre of Spiti Valley.

destinations.name: Jaipur
destinations.description: The Pink City with magnificent forts, palaces, bazaars, and rich Rajasthani culture.

attractions.name: Amber Fort
attractions.description: Magnificent fort known for its artistic style and Maa Shila Devi Temple.

attractions.name: Hawa Mahal
attractions.description: Palace of Winds, known for its unique honeycomb facade.

attractions.name: City Palace
attractions.description: Complex of palaces, courtyards, and gardens in the city center.

destinations.name: Udaipur
destinations.description: City of Lakes with romantic settings, grand palaces, and rich royal heritage.

destinations.name: Agra
destinations.description: Home to the Taj Mahal, one of Seven Wonders, with Mughal architecture and rich history.

destinations.name: Hampi
destinations.description: UNESCO World Heritage site with ancient ruins, boulder landscapes, and Vijayanagara history.

destinations.name: Varanasi
destinations.description: Spiritual capital of India with ancient temples, Ganga Aarti, ghats, and deep spirituality.

destinations.name: Rishikesh
destinations.description: Yoga capital of the world with river rafting, ashrams, Ganga Aarti, and spiritual experiences.

destinations.name: Amritsar
destinations.description: Holy city with Golden Temple, Wagah Border ceremony, Punjabi culture, and delicious food.
destinations.nearest_airport: Sri Guru Ram Dass Jee International Airport

destinations.name: Haridwar
destinations.description: Sacred city on Ganges with evening Ganga Aarti, temples, ashrams, and spiritual atmosphere.

destinations.name: Tirupati
destinations.description: Famous pilgrimage site with Venkateswara Temple, one of the richest temples in the world.

destinations.name: Kerala Backwaters
destinations.description: Serene network of lagoons and lakes with houseboat cruises, lush greenery, and Ayurvedic treatments.

attractions.name: Alappuzha Houseboats
attractions.description: Cruising the serene backwaters on a traditional Kettuvallam.

attractions.name: Vembanad Lake
attractions.description: Longest lake in India, central to the backwater network.

destinations.name: Munnar
destinations.description: Tea gardens, misty hills, spice plantations, and cool climate. Perfect honeymoon destination.

destinations.name: Coorg
destinations.description: Scotland of India with coffee plantations, waterfalls, forests, and pleasant climate.

destinations.name: Ooty
destinations.description: Queen of Hill Stations with tea gardens, botanical gardens, toy train, and pleasant weather.

destinations.name: Jim Corbett National Park
destinations.description: Oldest national park in India with tiger safaris, diverse wildlife, and beautiful Himalayan foothills.

destinations.name: Ranthambore National Park
destinations.description: Famous tiger reserve with historic fort, diverse wildlife, and excellent tiger sighting opportunities.

destinations.name: Kaziranga National Park
destinations.description: UNESCO World Heritage Site famous for one-horned rhinoceros, elephant safaris, and wetlands.

destinations.name: Jaisalmer
destinations.description: Golden City with sand dunes, camel safaris, desert camping, and magnificent fort architecture.

destinations.name: Pushkar
destinations.description: Holy town with sacred lake, Brahma temple, colorful camel fair, and vibrant bazaars.

destinations.name: Shillong
destinations.description: Scotland of the East with living root bridges, waterfalls, caves, and pleasant climate.

destinations.name: Gangtok
destinations.description: Capital of Sikkim with Kanchenjunga views, monasteries, cable car rides, and serene atmosphere.

destinations.name: Tawang
destinations.description: Remote Buddhist town with largest monastery in India, snow peaks, and pristine landscapes.

destinations.name: Mumbai
destinations.description: Financial capital with Bollywood, Gateway of India, beaches, street food, and vibrant nightlife.

destinations.name: Delhi
destinations.description: Capital city with historical monuments, diverse cuisine, markets, and blend of old and new.

destinations.name: Bangalore
destinations.description: Silicon Valley of India with pleasant climate, parks, pubs, and modern infrastructure.

destinations.name: Kolkata
destinations.description: City of Joy with colonial architecture, Durga Puja, street food, literature, and art culture.
destinations.nearest_airport: Netaji Subhas Chandra Bose International Airport

destinations.name: Hyderabad
destinations.description: City of Pearls with Charminar, biryani, tech industry, and rich Nizami culture.

destinations.name: Pondicherry
destinations.description: French colonial town with beaches, Auroville, cafes, and unique Indo-French culture.

destinations.name: Khajuraho
destinations.description: UNESCO World Heritage Site famous for erotic temple sculptures and Chandela architecture.

destinations.name: Mysore
destinations.description: City of Palaces with magnificent Mysore Palace, sandalwood, silk, and yoga heritage.

destinations.name: McLeod Ganj
destinations.description: Little Lhasa with Tibetan culture, Dalai Lama residence, trekking, and spiritual retreats.

destinations.name: Leh
destinations.description: Gateway to Ladakh with monasteries, Shanti Stupa, local markets, and acclimatization base.

destinations.name: Bhubaneswar
destinations.description: Temple City of India with ancient Kalinga architecture and modern infrastructure.

attractions.name: Lingaraja Temple
attractions.description: 11th-century temple, a masterpiece of Kalinga architecture.

destinations.name: Puri
destinations.description: Holy coastal city famous for the Jagannath Temple and long, sandy beaches.

destinations.name: Madurai
destinations.description: Temple city known for Meenakshi Amman Temple and its Dravidian architecture.

attractions.name: Meenakshi Amman Temple
attractions.description: Massive temple complex with stunning gopurams.

destinations.name: Coimbatore
destinations.description: Known as the Manchester of South India, a hub for textiles and industry near the Western Ghats.

destinations.name: Rameswaram
destinations.description: Pilgrimage site and island town, home to one of the 12 Jyotirlinga temples of Shiva.

destinations.name: Kashmir Valley (Srinagar)
destinations.description: Heaven on Earth with Mughal gardens, Dal Lake houseboats, and snow-capped peaks.

attractions.name: Dal Lake
attractions.description: Famous for Shikara rides and houseboats.

attractions.name: Mughal Gardens
attractions.description: Historic gardens like Shalimar Bagh and Nishat Bagh.

destinations.name: Bodh Gaya
destinations.description: The most sacred site in Buddhism, where Siddhartha Gautama attained enlightenment.

destinations.name: Lonavala & Khandala
destinations.description: Popular hill stations in the Western Ghats with lush green valleys, waterfalls, and caves.

destinations.name: Coorg
destinations.description: Scotland of India with coffee plantations, waterfalls, forests, and pleasant climate.

destinations.name: Amarnath
destinations.description: Major Hindu shrine in a cave, famous for the natural ice Shiva Lingam (seasonal pilgrimage).

destinations.name: Dwarka
destinations.description: Ancient kingdom of Lord Krishna, a major Hindu pilgrimage site (Char Dham).

destinations.name: Dehradun
destinations.description: Gateway to the Garhwal Himalayas with caves, waterfalls, monasteries, and laid-back city vibes.

destinations.name: Auli
destinations.description: Premier ski destination with panoramic Nanda Devi views, ropeway, and alpine meadows.

destinations.name: Chopta
destinations.description: Mini Switzerland of India, base for Tungnath–Chandrashila trek and meadows like Gorson/Deoriatal.

destinations.name: Kedarnath
destinations.description: Renowned Char Dham shrine with dramatic Himalayan backdrop and trekking approach from Gaurikund.

destinations.name: Badrinath
destinations.description: Major Char Dham temple town on the Alaknanda with Mana village and Vasudhara Falls nearby.

destinations.name: Gangotri
destinations.description: Source of the Ganges pilgrimage town with Gangotri Temple and trailhead to Gaumukh-Tapovan.

destinations.name: Yamunotri
destinations.description: Source of Yamuna pilgrimage with hot springs at Janki Chatti and trek to the shrine.

destinations.name: Joshimath
destinations.description: Gateway town to Auli, Badrinath, and Valley of Flowers with ropeway and ancient monasteries.

destinations.name: Valley of Flowers National Park
destinations.description: UNESCO alpine valley famed for endemic flora, accessed via Govindghat–Ghangaria trek.

destinations.name: Hemkund Sahib
destinations.description: High-altitude Sikh shrine by a glacial lake near Ghangaria, approached via a steep trek.

destinations.name: Kausani
destinations.description: Quiet hill town with panoramic Himalayan views of Trishul, Nanda Devi, and Panchachuli.

destinations.name: Almora
destinations.description: Cultural heart of Kumaon with heritage temples and access to Binsar Wildlife Sanctuary.

destinations.name: Ranikhet
destinations.description: Quiet cantonment hill station with orchards, Himalayan views, and pine forests.

destinations.name: Munsiyari
destinations.description: Remote Kumaon town with Panchachuli views and treks to Khaliya Top and Milam Glacier.

destinations.name: Lansdowne
destinations.description: Quiet Garhwal cantonment hill station with oak–pine forests and colonial-era churches.

destinations.name: Uttarkashi
destinations.description: District HQ on the Bhagirathi, base for Dayara Bugyal and Har Ki Dun region treks.

destinations.name: Pithoragarh
destinations.description: Eastern Kumaon frontier town with fort ruins and access to Askot Wildlife Sanctuary.

destinations.name: Dharamshala
destinations.description: Foothill city below McLeod Ganj with cricket stadium, monasteries, and tea gardens.

destinations.name: Dalhousie
destinations.description: Colonial-era hill station with pine-clad valleys and access to Khajjiar meadows.

destinations.name: Khajjiar
destinations.description: The Mini Switzerland of India with saucer-shaped meadow, deodar forests, and lake.

destinations.name: Kasol
destinations.description: Parvati Valley hamlet popular with backpackers, gateway to Kheerganga and Tosh treks.

destinations.name: Kullu
destinations.description: Valley district town on the Beas with temples and gateway to Tirthan and Parvati valleys.

destinations.name: Tirthan Valley
destinations.description: Serene GHNP buffer valley known for trout fishing, hikes, and eco-stays around Gushaini–Banjar.

destinations.name: Jibhi
destinations.description: Charming hamlet near Jalori Pass with wooden homestays, waterfalls, and easy hikes.

destinations.name: Bir Billing
destinations.description: India’s paragliding capital with Tibetan monasteries and scenic landing site at Bir.

destinations.name: Palampur
destinations.description: Tea garden town with Dhauladhar views, monasteries, and nearby Andretta artists’ village.

destinations.name: Kinnaur (Kalpa)
destinations.description: Apple country with Kinnaur Kailash views; Kalpa–Roghi villages and ancient monasteries.

destinations.name: Sangla Valley
destinations.description: Baspa River valley with Kamru Fort, Rakchham meadows, and gateway to Chitkul village.

destinations.name: Chitkul
destinations.description: India’s last village on the Indo–Tibetan road with wooden houses and alpine scenery.

destinations.name: Kasauli
destinations.description: Quaint cantonment hill town near Chandigarh with colonial charm and gentle hikes.

destinations.name: Solan
destinations.description: Shivalik town known for Shoolini Mata temple, breweries, and proximity to Kasauli.

destinations.name: Mandi
destinations.description: Historic town on the Beas with 80-plus temples and access to Prashar Lake and Barot Valley.

destinations.name: Prashar Lake
destinations.description: High-altitude lake with floating island near Mandi, reached via a scenic forest trek/road.

destinations.name: Chamba
destinations.description: Ravi valley town with temples, Bhuri Singh Museum, and access to Chamera Lake and Khajjiar.

destinations.name: Keylong
destinations.description: Lahaul HQ on Manali–Leh highway with monasteries; base for Baralacha La and Suraj Tal drives.

destinations.name: Sissu
destinations.description: Scenic Lahaul village just beyond Atal Tunnel with Sissu waterfall and Chandra River views.

destinations.name: Srinagar
destinations.description: Summer capital famed for Dal Lake houseboats, Mughal gardens, and Kashmiri culture.

destinations.name: Gulmarg
destinations.description: Premier ski and meadow destination with gondola rides and views of Pir Panjal.

destinations.name: Pahalgam
destinations.description: Lidder Valley resort with pine forests, Betab Valley and Aru meadows; Amarnath route hub.

destinations.name: Vaishno Devi (Katra)
destinations.description: Major Hindu pilgrimage trek to the Vaishno Devi shrine from Katra base town.

destinations.name: Ajanta & Ellora Caves
destinations.description: UNESCO rock-cut cave temples and monasteries near Aurangabad, masterpieces of ancient India.

destinations.name: Lonavala & Khandala
destinations.description: Sahyadri twin hill stations with forts (Lohagad, Rajmachi), waterfalls, and monsoon vistas.

destinations.name: Mahabaleshwar
destinations.description: Strawberry capital with viewpoints, Mapro gardens, and nearby hill-station Panchgani.

destinations.name: Alibaug
destinations.description: Konkan coastal town with beaches (Kihim, Varsoli), Kolaba Fort, and seaside homestays.

destinations.name: Somnath
destinations.description: One of the 12 Jyotirlinga temples set on the Arabian Sea coast at Prabhas Patan.

destinations.name: Dwarka
destinations.description: Ancient city of Lord Krishna with Dwarkadhish Temple and Gomti Ghat on the coast.

destinations.name: Gir National Park
destinations.description: Last abode of the Asiatic lion offering jeep safaris amid teak forests and waterholes.

destinations.name: Great Rann of Kutch (Dhordo)
destinations.description: White salt desert famed for Rann Utsav, desert camps, and moonlit vistas near Dhordo.

destinations.name: Madurai
destinations.description: Ancient city on the Vaigai River, home to the ornate Meenakshi Amman Temple complex.

destinations.name: Rameswaram
destinations.description: Island town with Ramanathaswamy Temple, Pamban Bridge, and sacred coastal ghats.

destinations.name: Kanyakumari
destinations.description: Southern tip of India with Vivekananda Rock Memorial, Thiruvalluvar Statue, and sunsets.

destinations.name: Mahabalipuram
destinations.description: UNESCO coastal heritage with rock-cut shore temples, Pancha Rathas, and cave sanctuaries.

destinations.name: Kodaikanal
destinations.description: Princess of Hill Stations with scenic lake, Coaker's Walk, Pillar Rocks, and rolling hills.

destinations.name: Wayanad
destinations.description: Western Ghats district with Edakkal Caves, Banasura Sagar Dam, and wildlife sanctuaries.

destinations.name: Varkala
destinations.description: Cliffside beach town with red laterite cliffs, cafes, and Janardanaswamy Temple.

destinations.name: Kovalam
destinations.description: Popular beach near Trivandrum featuring lighthouse beach, crescent shoreline, and Ayurveda.

destinations.name: Chikmagalur
destinations.description: Coffee country with Western Ghats peaks like Mullayanagiri, Kudremukh, and Bhadra reserve.

destinations.name: Udupi & Malpe
destinations.description: Temple town famed for cuisine and Krishna Matha; Malpe beach and St. Mary’s Island nearby.

destinations.name: Murudeshwar
destinations.description: Coastal pilgrimage with towering Shiva statue, temple complex, and beach activities.

destinations.name: Puri
destinations.description: Beach city famed for Jagannath Temple, Rath Yatra, and golden coastline.

destinations.name: Konark
destinations.description: UNESCO Sun Temple town with intricate chariot-shaped temple and serene Chandrabhaga beach.

destinations.name: Chilika Lake (Satapada)
destinations.description: Asia’s largest brackish water lagoon with migratory birds and Irrawaddy dolphins.

destinations.name: Bodh Gaya
destinations.description: Place of Buddha’s enlightenment with Mahabodhi Temple complex and international monasteries.

destinations.name: Deoghar
destinations.description: Pilgrimage city with Baidyanath Jyotirlinga temple complex and serene hillscapes around.

destinations.name: Bandhavgarh National Park
destinations.description: Central India tiger reserve with high sighting chances and fort ruins amid sal forests.

destinations.name: Kanha National Park
destinations.description: Lush sal and bamboo forests inspired Kipling; rich tiger and barasingha populations.

destinations.name: Pachmarhi
destinations.description: Satpura hill station with caves, waterfalls, viewpoints, and biosphere reserve access.

destinations.name: Sundarbans National Park
destinations.description: UNESCO mangrove delta with tiger habitat, creeks, and birdlife accessible via boat safaris.

destinations.name: Shirdi
destinations.description: Pilgrimage town of Sai Baba with Samadhi Mandir and spiritual ashram experience.

destinations.name: Cherrapunji (Sohra)
destinations.description: High rainfall plateau with living root bridges, Nohkalikai Falls, and limestone caves.

destinations.name: Mawlynnong
destinations.description: Asia’s cleanest village with living root bridges and viewpoints over Bangladesh plains.

destinations.name: Dawki & Shnongpdeng
destinations.description: Crystal-clear Umngot River boating, cliff jumping, and camping near Bangladesh border.

destinations.name: Ziro Valley
destinations.description: Apatani plateau valley with rice fields, pine-clad hills, and the Ziro Music Festival.

destinations.name: Tawang
destinations.description: High-altitude town with India’s largest monastery, Sela Pass, and pristine lakes.

destinations.name: Kaziranga National Park
destinations.description: UNESCO park famed for one-horned rhinos, elephant safaris, and birdlife on the Brahmaputra floodplains.

destinations.name: Majuli
destinations.description: World’s largest river island on the Brahmaputra with Vaishnavite satras and tribal culture.

destinations.name: Shnongrim Ridge (Jaintia Hills)
destinations.description: Caving paradise with Krem Liat Prah system, crystal caves, and ridge trails.

destinations.name: Kohima
destinations.description: Capital with World War II cemetery, Kisama Heritage Village, and Hornbill Festival.

destinations.name: Imphal
destinations.description: Valley capital with Kangla Fort, Ima Keithel women’s market, and floating Keibul Lamjao Park nearby.

destinations.name: Aizawl
destinations.description: Hilltop capital with panoramic views, Mizo culture, Solomon's Temple, and Reiek Peak nearby.

destinations.name: Champhai
destinations.description: Frontier town with vineyards, Rih Dil (across border), and rolling Mizo highlands.

destinations.name: Agartala
destinations.description: Capital with Ujjayanta Palace, heritage temples, and green landscapes near Bangladesh border.

destinations.name: Unakoti
destinations.description: Ancient rock reliefs and Shaivite carvings set amidst forested hills in Kailashahar region.

destinations.name: Neermahal (Rudrasagar Lake)
destinations.description: Lake palace built by the Tripura kings on Rudrasagar; boating and heritage architecture.

destinations.name: Pelling
destinations.description: Kanchenjunga viewpoint town with Pemayangtse Monastery, Rabdentse ruins, and skywalk.

destinations.name: Yuksom
destinations.description: First capital of Sikkim and trailhead to Goecha La with Dubdi Monastery and coronation throne.

destinations.name: Zuluk (Old Silk Route)
destinations.description: Eastern Sikkim switchbacks with Thambi Viewpoint, snowfall in winter, and heritage Silk Route.

destinations.name: Namchi
destinations.description: South Sikkim town with Samdruptse statue, Siddheshwar Dham (Char Dham), and tea gardens.

destinations.name: Kalimpong
destinations.description: Hill town near Darjeeling with Deolo Hill, Durpin Monastery, and cactus nursery.

destinations.name: Digha
destinations.description: Popular Bay of Bengal seaside resort with wide beaches and marine aquarium.

destinations.name: Mandarmani
destinations.description: Long drivable beach near Digha with resorts and shallow waters for family getaways.

destinations.name: Sonamarg
destinations.description: Meadow of gold with Thajiwas Glacier, river valleys, and high-altitude vistas.

destinations.name: Kargil
destinations.description: Trans-Himalayan town on Srinagar–Leh highway with Suru valley and war memorials.

destinations.name: Bikaner
destinations.description: Desert city with Junagarh Fort, camel research farm, and havelis.

destinations.name: Jodhpur
destinations.description: Blue City with Mehrangarh Fort, old city lanes, and Thar desert excursions.

destinations.name: Mount Abu
destinations.description: Aravalli hill station with Dilwara Temples, Nakki Lake, and viewpoints.

destinations.name: Sanchi
destinations.description: UNESCO Buddhist stupas and monasteries from Mauryan era near Bhopal.

destinations.name: Orchha
destinations.description: Riverside medieval town with palaces, cenotaphs (chhatris), and temples on Betwa.

destinations.name: Ayodhya
destinations.description: Ancient city on Sarayu River with temples and the newly built Shri Ram Janmabhoomi Mandir.

destinations.name: Mathura & Vrindavan
destinations.description: Krishna’s birthplace region with ghats, temples, and Holi festivities.

destinations.name: Prayagraj
destinations.description: Sangam city hosting Kumbh Mela, confluence of Ganga, Yamuna, and mythical Saraswati.

destinations.name: Chitrakoot
destinations.description: Sacred forested region of the Ramayana with ghats, caves, and waterfalls across UP/MP.

destinations.name: Nalanda & Rajgir
destinations.description: Ancient university ruins at Nalanda and hot springs, ropeway, and Vulture’s Peak at Rajgir.

destinations.name: Netarhat
destinations.description: Queen of Chotanagpur with pine forests, sunset point, and nearby waterfalls.

destinations.name: Betla National Park
destinations.description: Palamau Tiger Reserve with sal forests, waterfalls, and historical forts inside the park.

destinations.name: Chitrakote Falls
destinations.description: India’s Niagara on Indravati River with broad horseshoe cascade near Jagdalpur.

destinations.name: Barnawapara Wildlife Sanctuary
destinations.description: Deciduous forest sanctuary with leopards, bison, and birdlife near Raipur.

destinations.name: Gandikota
destinations.description: The Grand Canyon of India on Penna River with fort, canyon views, and camping.

destinations.name: Araku Valley
destinations.description: Eastern Ghats hill station near Vizag with coffee gardens, Borra Caves, and tribal culture.

destinations.name: Visakhapatnam (Vizag)
destinations.description: Coastal city with RK Beach, Kailasagiri, submarine museum, and nearby Yarada beach.

destinations.name: Warangal & Ramappa
destinations.description: Kakatiya heritage with Warangal Fort, Thousand Pillar Temple, and UNESCO Ramappa Temple.

destinations.name: Badami, Aihole & Pattadakal
destinations.description: Chalukyan heritage circuit with cave temples, early temple architecture, and UNESCO sites.

destinations.name: Bandipur National Park
destinations.description: Nilgiri biosphere tiger reserve with elephants, gaurs, and teak forests on Mysore–Ooty route.

destinations.name: Thekkady (Periyar)
destinations.description: Periyar Tiger Reserve with lake boat rides, spice plantations, and bamboo rafting.

destinations.name: Alleppey (Alappuzha)
destinations.description: Backwater hub with houseboats, canals, and beaches complementing Kerala backwater circuits.

destinations.name: Kavaratti (Lakshadweep)
destinations.description: Coral atoll with turquoise lagoons, water sports, and pristine beaches.

destinations.name: Agatti Island
destinations.description: Scenic island with airstrip, lagoons, snorkeling, and kayaking.

destinations.name: Daman
destinations.state: Dadra and Nagar Haveli and Daman and Diu
destinations.description: Union territory beach town with Devka/Jampore beaches and colonial forts.

destinations.name: Diu
destinations.state: Dadra and Nagar Haveli and Daman and Diu
destinations.description: Island town with beaches, Portuguese fort, churches, and Naida Caves.

destinations.name: Chandigarh
destinations.description: Planned city with Capitol Complex, Rock Garden, and Sukhna Lake at Shivalik foothills.

destinations.name: Adi Kailash (Chhota Kailash)
destinations.description: Sacred peak near India–Nepal border with Om Parvat darshan on the Adi Kailash yatra.

destinations.name: Kinnaur Kailash
destinations.description: Mythic Shivling rock and high-altitude pass trek overlooking Sutlej valley in Kinnaur.

destinations.name: Manimahesh Kailash
destinations.description: Pilgrimage to Manimahesh Lake at the base of Kailash peak in Bharmour, Chamba.

destinations.name: Shrikhand Mahadev Kailash
destinations.description: Challenging yatra to a 72‑ft Shivalinga at ~5,700 m via Kurpan valley in Kullu/Shimla.

destinations.name: Mount Kailash & Mansarovar
destinations.description: Sacred Mount Kailash with circumambulation (parikrama) and Lake Mansarovar pilgrimage.

destinations.name: Kashmir Great Lakes Trek
destinations.description: Alpine trek across multiple high lakes (Vishansar, Krishansar, Gadsar, Satsar, Nundkol).

destinations.name: Tarsar Marsar Trek
destinations.description: Twin alpine lakes trek in Aru–Lidder valley with meadows and pine forests.

destinations.name: Kedarkantha Trek
destinations.description: Popular winter summit trek from Sankri with 360° views of Swargarohini and Bandarpunch.

destinations.name: Har Ki Dun Trek
destinations.description: Valley of gods trek through ancient villages in Govind Pashu Vihar sanctuary.

destinations.name: Brahmatal Trek
destinations.description: Winter trek to alpine lake with Mt. Trishul and Nandaghunti views from the ridgeline.

destinations.name: Kuari Pass (Curzon Trail)
destinations.description: Classic Himalayan pass with Nanda Devi sanctuary views; meadows and oak–rhododendron forests.

destinations.name: Hampta Pass Trek
destinations.description: Crossover trek from Kullu’s green valleys to Lahaul’s stark landscapes, ending at Chandratal option.

destinations.name: Bhrigu Lake Trek
destinations.description: Short high-altitude trek to a changing-color alpine lake above Manali’s meadows.

destinations.name: Beas Kund Trek
destinations.description: Glacial lake trek near Manali with views of Hanuman Tibba, Ladakhi, and Friendship Peak.

destinations.name: Pin Parvati Pass Trek
destinations.description: Difficult trans-Himalayan crossover from lush Parvati valley to Spiti’s cold desert.

destinations.name: Markha Valley Trek
destinations.description: Classic Ladakh trek through Buddhist villages and river gorges beneath Kang Yatse massif.

destinations.name: Goecha La Trek
destinations.description: Kanchenjunga viewpoint trek via Dzongri meadows from Yuksom in Khangchendzonga NP.

destinations.name: Sandakphu–Phalut Trek
destinations.description: Singalila ridge trek with views of four 8000ers: Everest, Lhotse, Makalu, Kanchenjunga.

destinations.name: Triund Trek
destinations.description: Short meadow trek from McLeod Ganj with Dhauladhar views; popular beginner trail.

destinations.name: Indrahar Pass Trek
destinations.description: High pass above Triund linking Kangra to Chamba with dramatic rock faces and snow fields.

destinations.name: Kareri Lake Trek
destinations.description: Glacial lake trek through pine forests and shepherd villages near Dharamshala.

destinations.name: Sar Pass Trek
destinations.description: Kasol–Grahan–Sar Pass snow trek across meadows, forests, and alpine zones in Parvati Valley.

destinations.name: Chandrakhani Pass Trek
destinations.description: Classic Kullu trek connecting Malana–Naggar with panoramic Pir Panjal and Dhauladhar views.

destinations.name: Deo Tibba Base Trek
destinations.description: High meadows and moraine trek towards the base of Deo Tibba near Manali.

destinations.name: Kheerganga Trek
destinations.description: Parvati Valley trek through pine forests to hot springs and meadows at Kheerganga.

destinations.name: Bhaba Pass (Pin–Bhaba) Trek
destinations.description: Kinnaur crossover from lush Bhaba valley to Spiti’s Pin valley across high alpine pass.

destinations.name: Kugti Pass Trek
destinations.description: Remote Pir Panjal pass from Bharmour to Pangi with rugged trails and high meadows.

destinations.name: Jalsu Pass Trek
destinations.description: Green meadows route linking Kangra to Chamba, called the floral pass of the Dhauladhars.

destinations.name: Parang La Trek
destinations.description: High-altitude desert trek connecting Spiti’s Kibber to Tso Moriri region in Ladakh.

destinations.name: Rani Sui Lake Trek
destinations.description: Short trek to alpine lake above Manali offering vistas of Pir Panjal and Dhauladhar.

destinations.name: Serolsar Lake (Jalori) Trek
destinations.description: Forest trail from Jalori Pass to a sacred lake with temple and tranquil setting in Tirthan.

destinations.name: Lam Dal & Kareri Seven Lakes Trek
destinations.description: Glacial lakes circuit in Dhauladhar range near Kareri with rugged trails and high camps.

destinations.name: Kedarnath Temple
destinations.description: One of the twelve Jyotirlingas dedicated to Lord Shiva, set amid the Garhwal Himalayas.

destinations.name: Badrinath Temple
destinations.description: Part of Char Dham dedicated to Lord Vishnu on the banks of Alaknanda in Badrinath town.

destinations.name: Gangotri Temple
destinations.description: Source of the River Ganga with ancient temple dedicated to Goddess Ganga in Gangotri town.

destinations.name: Yamunotri Temple
destinations.description: Source of River Yamuna with hot springs at Janki Chatti; revered shrine dedicated to Goddess Yamuna.

destinations.name: Hemkund Sahib Gurudwara
destinations.description: High-altitude Sikh shrine by a glacial lake near Ghangaria; important pilgrimage site.

destinations.name: Jageshwar Dham
destinations.description: Temple complex of over 100 stone temples amidst deodar forests; one of Jyotirlinga claims.

destinations.name: Neelkanth Mahadev Temple
destinations.description: Popular Shiva temple near Rishikesh set amidst forests in the Pauri Garhwal region.

destinations.name: Chandi Devi Temple
destinations.description: Hilltop temple overlooking Haridwar; reached by ropeway or trek; revered Shaktipeeth.

destinations.name: Mansa Devi Temple
destinations.description: Shakti temple on Bilwa Parvat in Haridwar with ropeway access and city views.

destinations.name: Jwala Devi (Kangra)
destinations.description: Shaktipeeth with eternal flame near Kangra; one of the most revered temples in HP.

destinations.name: Chintpurni Temple
destinations.description: Major Shaktipeeth dedicated to Goddess Chhinmastika in Una district of Himachal Pradesh.

destinations.name: Naina Devi Temple (Bilaspur)
destinations.description: Hilltop Shaktipeeth above Gobind Sagar Lake; accessed by ropeway or road.

destinations.name: Baijnath Temple (Kangra)
destinations.description: Ancient Shiva temple in Nagara style on the banks of the Binwa River near Palampur.

destinations.name: Ahmedabad
destinations.description: Heritage city with Sabarmati Ashram, pol houses, stepwells (Adalaj), and vibrant cuisine.

destinations.name: Vadodara
destinations.description: Royal city with Laxmi Vilas Palace, museums, Sayaji Baug, and close to Champaner-Pavagadh.

destinations.name: Statue of Unity (Kevadia)
destinations.description: World’s tallest statue of Sardar Patel with viewing gallery, valley of flowers, and dam views.

destinations.name: Saputara
destinations.description: Gujarat’s hill station with lake, viewpoints, ropeway, and monsoon greenery (Dang district).

destinations.name: Pune
destinations.description: Cultural capital with Shaniwar Wada, Aga Khan Palace, vibrant food, and Sahyadri getaways.

destinations.name: Nashik
destinations.description: Wine capital with vineyards (Sula), temples on Godavari, and Kumbh Mela city.

destinations.name: Elephanta Caves
destinations.description: UNESCO rock-cut cave temples on Elephanta Island, ferry from Gateway of India (Mumbai).

destinations.name: Dudhsagar Falls
destinations.description: Spectacular multi-tiered waterfall on the Goa–Karnataka border within Bhagwan Mahaveer Sanctuary.

destinations.name: Old Goa Churches
destinations.description: UNESCO churches and convents including Basilica of Bom Jesus and Se Cathedral near Panaji.

destinations.name: Palolem Beach
destinations.description: Serene crescent-shaped beach in South Goa with shacks, kayaking, and relaxed vibe.

destinations.name: Panaji (Panjim)
destinations.description: Capital with Latin quarters (Fontainhas), Mandovi river cruises, Miramar beach, and casinos.

destinations.name: Chennai
destinations.description: Metropolis with Marina Beach, Kapaleeshwarar Temple, Fort St. George, and classical arts.

destinations.name: Kanchipuram
destinations.description: City of a thousand temples famed for silk sarees; Ekambareswarar, Kailasanathar temples.

destinations.name: Thanjavur
destinations.description: Chola heritage city with UNESCO Brihadeeswara Temple, palace, and bronze art.

destinations.name: Narkanda
destinations.description: Hill town beyond Shimla known for Hatu Peak, skiing in winter, and apple orchards.

destinations.name: Kufri
destinations.description: Popular hill spot near Shimla for snow activities, Himalayan Nature Park, and views.

destinations.name: Mashobra
destinations.description: Quiet retreat near Shimla with pine forests, rafting at nearby Tattapani, and trails.

destinations.name: Chail
destinations.description: Former summer capital with world’s highest cricket ground, palace hotel, and nature.

destinations.name: Naldehra
destinations.description: Scenic golfing hill with deodar forests and Himalayan views, close to Shimla and Mashobra.

destinations.name: Tattapani
destinations.description: Satluj riverside with hot sulphur springs, river rafting, and scenic drives from Shimla.

destinations.name: Fagu
destinations.description: Hamlet near Kufri with terraced fields, apple orchards, and serene Himalayan views.

destinations.name: Shoghi
destinations.description: Forest getaway on Kalka–Shimla route with homestays, trails, and quiet hill ambience.

destinations.name: Jakhoo Temple
destinations.description: Hilltop Hanuman temple above Shimla with tall statue and panoramic city views.

destinations.name: Tara Devi Temple
destinations.description: Temple dedicated to Goddess Tara on a forested hill along the Shimla–Kalka highway.

destinations.name: Kali Bari Temple (Shimla)
destinations.description: Prominent temple near Mall Road dedicated to Goddess Kali; popular with visitors.

destinations.name: Sankat Mochan Temple (Shimla)
destinations.description: Hanuman temple complex on Shimla bypass road amid cedar forests; peaceful ambience.
